title: One Two Three, Shatter
description: This edition is no longer available.Life was harsh and cruel to Kaleb Xander, and he was never given a moment's rest to breathe in the misery. Finding his way out in the real world from the cage of wrath and perverted lust, he found it to be a mere step up from what he was used to, abuse coming in different ways, through different avenues. One would think all it would take is one person to reach out their hand and save this lost soul -- but Kaleb is more complicated than that. It'll take a miracle, and he's banking on someone to be just that for him before he gives it all up.CONTENT ADVISORY: This title contains scenes of rape or near rape.Word Count: 155,517
author: Joey James Hook
